title: IronClaw — AI Tool Review
description: IronClaw is a security-first personal AI assistant with sandboxed tools — a safer alternative to OpenClaw for autonomous task automation. IronClaw is a security-focused alternative to OpenClaw developed by NEAR AI. It implements sandboxed tool execution to prevent prompt injection attacks and unauthorized system access. IronClaw is designed for users who want OpenClaw-style automation but with enterprise-grade security controls. Highlights: Security-first design with sandboxed execution. Prevents prompt injection attacks. Open-source and auditable. Built by NEAR AI team.
